  • Classes in com.eemi.ext4j.client.ui used by com.eemi.ext4j.client.chart 
    Class and Description
    ToolTip
    ToolTip is aTip implementation that handles the common case of displaying a tooltip when hovering over a certain element or elements on the page.
  • Classes in com.eemi.ext4j.client.ui used by com.eemi.ext4j.client.core 
    Class and Description
    BoxComponent
    Base class for any visual Component that uses a box container.
    Container
    Base class for any Component that can contain other components.
    LoadMask
    A modal, floating Component which may be shown above a specified Element, or a specified Component while loading data.
  • Classes in com.eemi.ext4j.client.ui used by com.eemi.ext4j.client.dd 
    Class and Description
    Layer
    An extended ExtElement object that supports a shadow and shim, constrain to viewport and automatic maintaining of shadow/shim positions.
  • Classes in com.eemi.ext4j.client.ui used by com.eemi.ext4j.client.events.button

    A menu object.
    MenuItem
    A base class for all menu items that require menu-related functionality such as click handling, sub-menus, icons, etc.
    SplitButton
    A split button that provides a built-in dropdown arrow that can fire an event separately from the default click event of the button.

    Simple header class which is used for on NotificationContainer and Window

    A basic hidden field for storing hidden values in forms that need to be passed in the form submit.

    The TreePanel provides tree-structured UI representation of tree-structured data.
    TreeView
    Used as a view by TreePanel .
    TriggerField
    Provides a convenient wrapper for TextFields that adds a clickable trigger button (looks like a combobox by default).
    Viewport
    A specialized container representing the viewable application area (the browser viewport).
    VTypes
    Basic pre-created validation types.
    Window
    A specialized panel intended for use as an application window.
